name: Saiyan legend
description:
Saiyan legend l is a classic anime idle RPG. Fully experience the exciting battles, collect the powerful warriors, so join in right now and explore the amazing adventure!

A variety of characters, output genres, auxiliary genres, defense genres, choose the most suitable lineup for your fight
You don't need to be online all the time, hang up every day to get the upgrade hero
Choose a number of heroes you like to combine powerful and cool exclusive combination skills
Defeat the evil enemies on the planet and become the hero of saving the world

All the classic characters
Mix and match your favorite heroes, summon the dragon, upgrade your crew, and build the strongest crew in the universe!

Thrilling battle effects
Super cool battle visuals and sound effects, make your gaming experience all the more realistic. Unleash your infinite combos to be the last man standing!

Let your battle power soar
Power and explosion! Use your brute force to conquer all of the universe’s evil forces and gain endless rewards!
